Package my.uum

Class Class_B

java.lang.Object
my.uum.Class_A
my.uum.Class_B
Direct Known Subclasses:
Class_C
public class Class_B
extends Class_A
This class is for calculating 60% of Total Carry Marks by combining Total Quiz, Test and Assignment Marks.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    double b
    This attribute represent Total Quiz and Test Marks.
    double c
    This attribute represent Total Assignment Marks.

    This method is for getting the input of Total Assignment Marks.

    This method is for calculating 60% of Total Carry Marks by combining Total Quiz, Test and Assignment Marks.

    • disp_a

      public void disp_a()
      This method is for displaying Matric No, letting the user input the Total Quiz, Test and Assignment Marks. The Marks must be between 0 - 100%.

      disp_a in class Class_A
